Description: L3Harris received full-rate production orders of nearly $300 million to deliver cryptographic-compliant multi-channel radios to the US Army. The post L3Harris Secures $300M US Army Contract for Cryptographic-Compliant Radios appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: France Orders Over $600 Million in Air Defense, Counter Drone Systems
Description: The French Directorate General for Armament has ordered new air defense and counter drone systems for 600 million euros ($624 million). The post France Orders Over $600 Million in Air Defense, Counter Drone Systems appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: US Think Tank Urges Ukraine Lessons for Future Combat Vehicle
Description: Congressional Research Service has asked whether Ukraine lessons have been incorporated into the US Army’s XM-30 Mechanized Infantry Combat Vehicle program. The post US Think Tank Urges Ukraine Lessons for Future Combat Vehicle appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: HII Starts Fabrication of 16th San Antonio Amphibious Transport Dock
Description: HII has begun the construction of the 16th San Antonio-class amphibious transport dock vessel in Pascagoula, Mississippi. The post HII Starts Fabrication of 16th San Antonio Amphibious Transport Dock appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: Local Charity Donates Mortars, Trucks to Ukrainian Army
Description: The Armed Forces of Ukraine has accepted mortars and trucks from a local NGO to support its defense against Russia. The post Local Charity Donates Mortars, Trucks to Ukrainian Army appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: Lebanon Official Media Reports Israeli Strike in South
Description: Israeli strike hit south Lebanon, the second consecutive day to see such a raid despite a fragile ceasefire between Israel and Hezbollah. The post Lebanon Official Media Reports Israeli Strike in South appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: US Receives 900th THAAD Interceptor
Description: The US Missile Defense Agency has taken delivery of its 900th Terminal High Altitude Area Defense (THAAD) interceptor from Lockheed Martin. The post US Receives 900th THAAD Interceptor appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: L3Harris Demos T7 Robot With Advanced Electronic Warfare Capabilities
Description: L3Harris has equipped its T7 unmanned ground vehicle with cutting-edge electronic warfare capabilities. The post L3Harris Demos T7 Robot With Advanced Electronic Warfare Capabilities appeared first on The Defense Post.
